item.description:
Gilrein's, dubbed Worcester's "Home of the Blues," is actually a world-renowned blues club, which originally opened as a steak house in 1933. The club, which had been closed since 2002, re-opened in March, 2007. I haven't been there since it reopened but it has great reviews! There is FREE VALET PARKING.

CLUTCH CRABWELL will be playing tonight.
There is a $10.00 COVER CHARGE


**NOTE: We didn't make it last weekend due to the storm. Shall we try this again? Anyone interested?
item.how_to_find_us: TBA: Please check for an update.
item.why: This has been posted as a must see band!
item.name: CLUTCH CRABWELL @ Gilrein's Home of the Blues
